content: I'm actually listening to "Crime Scene". It's not as popular as some of the others, but I really enjoy it. The hosts have a great dynamic and they dive deep into the cases. I've been listening to it since the beginning, but I fell behind when I was on a yoga retreat and didn't have service. Speaking of which, have you heard about any good hiking trails in the area? I've been trying to get in more walks and hikes since I got back.
